overview: This enlightening documentary traces the rise and fall of Lemuria, a civilization that began 165,000 B.C. on the continent of Lemuria in the Pacific Ocean. This civilization was eventually destroyed through a cataclysmic event over 70,000 years ago. Discover how the higher consciousness of Lemuria, at its peak of ascendancy, will rise or remanifest within our own consciousness, bringing a new golden age for our world.
title: Lemuria Rising
